person.persName: John W. Stone (Caldwell County, petition signer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmhand. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Son of Caleb Wesley Stone and Jane Copper Stone. Student in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmhand in Princeton in 1860.
